briefdescription.para: Return whether integer n >= 2 is prime.
Return all divisors of x in sorted order.

simplesect.para: a vector where ret[idx] is the smallest prime divisor of idx
a map from the prime to the exponent

memberdef.argsstring: (const ll a, const ll b, ll &x, ll &y)
memberdef.name: egcd

briefdescription.para: Sets x and y so that $x\cdot a + y\cdot b = \gcd(a,b)$.
Returns the totient of the integer n.
Finds x such that a^x = b (mod M) using baby-step giant-step algorithm. a and M must be coprime.
Returns a primitive root modulo M.
